Stop Yes I\'ve granted permission No Permissions\nPlease note that Gamerboard requires the following permissions: Auto Start our service- ensure your score recording is not missed if the service is shut off by mistake [Only for MiUi/Vivo/Oppo] App usage stats- to make sure we record only your game screen and nothing else Accessibility- to make sure we record only your game screen and nothing else Battery Optimisation- Gamerboard Service is not shut off while you are in an intense gun fight on game Grant Unrestrticted access to Gamerboard in background power consumption management in battery settings. Draw over other apps- to make sure you have access to your Gamerboard data on game Some permissions are needed to be given from application settings. Later Continue Gamerboard has stopped recording your game. Restart gamerboard quickly. Restart Enable Your device isn\'t registered with us. Contact admin on discord channel. Gamerboard accessibility Helps Gamerboard to identify your game and maintain privacy Rank Player Finishes Stop Gamerboard Are you sure you want to stop Gamerboard from recording your game? //tutorial overlay Welcome to Gamerboard Turn on Gamerboard has lost scan permission.
Turn it back ON to log your scores properly. Please follow this short but
important tutorial to learn how
to verify Gamerboard before
playing %1$s. Gamerboard icon When playing via Gamerboard,
you will see this icon.

Tap on the icon to continue Gamerboard mini menu Tapping the icon shows the mini menu.

From here, you can see your connection status, help pages, your leaderboards, launch Gamerboard app, and shut off the overlay. Verify session Your session is currently
not verified. Verify session Your session is currently not verified. It is important to verify your profile for your score to be counted. Swipe right to verify Session verified! Green ⚬ means verified.

Make sure you’re verified before
starting any match. Ready to play! Each time you play a match via Gamerboard, make sure your session is verified.

We support only CLASSIC RANKEDmatches and press START Each time you play a match via Gamerboard, make sure your session is verified.

We support only BRmatches and press START Current leaderboard One more thing:

Your leaderboards can be viewed
in-game by tapping the leaderboard
icon in the mini-menu Tutorial match completed! You will compete in Gamerboard with players of similar skill level.

Rank up to compete for higher rewards.
You will be redirected to the #help channel on our discord server.

Do you want to continue? Do you wish to close Gamerboard app? Open the Gamerboard app? Open %1$s app?
You have been Unverified.
please re-verify yourself before starting a new match!
Your session is currently not verified.

Please go to your BGMI Profile page to
verify your session. Once the icon is green, it means your session is verified.
While verified, any games you play will count toward
your leaderboard play.

Make sure to check that you’re verified before
starting any match. Go to your BGMI Profile
page to verify your session. Your leaderboards can be viewed
in-game by tapping the leaderboard
icon in the mini-menu After each match, you can see
your GAMERBOARD score.

This is different from your
in-game BGMI score This shows your:

Points towards leaderboard

Match performance and
top 3 match status Congratulations for completing your
tutorial match!

You now have access to all leaderboards Now go earn some cash and rewards!

If you have any other questions, visit or FAQ or
contact us from the help section Swipe to BGMI Profile to verify session. Go to Freefire Max Profile to verify session. Please swipe right to your BGMI Profile page to verify your session. Please go to your Freefire Max Profile page to verify your session. OKAY Verification status Help page Your leaderboards Open Gamerboard app Disconnect Gamerboard Unverified Sample paragraph with dummy text Next Sample Enter your %1$s ID Verify your %1$s ID If not matching Your ID can be found on the upper left corner of your profile screen, under your username: We have detected your %1$s ID Please confirm if they match Retrying Your ID Number can be found in your profile screen, under your username I have checked my %1$s ID # and understand I this cannot be undone. Confirm CLOSE Your %1$s rank determines your Gamerboard rank +22 pts Skill level No tournaments joined! No Active Tournaments! Open Gamerboard App Final score will be calculated once all teammates submit their scores. You will be notified once final scores are available. Do you want to update your username to \"%1$s\"? Using the correct username is important for score calculation in team matches. Waiting on %1$s teammates to complete their game. Once their scores have been submitted, you will receive a notification of the final squad match score. Downloading assets... How was you experience with Gamerboard? Cancel Share your feedback with us Tell us your experience so we can better support you We’d love to hear from you to continue improving the product experience. Write your feedback Submit Did Gamerboard just restart? Gamerboard app was killed by your system in background. This might affects your games in future. Watch and follow this video to avoid this in future. 1. Go to recent apps and lock Gamerboard 3. Restart the device after steps 1 and 2. 2. If your device (like MI/redmi/oppo/vivo/iqoo/poco) has a game booster/game space app then whitelist Gamerboard and remove BGMI from the game boosting app. %1$s kills captured. We have processed your kills. Don\'t skip the next screen. Stay there till your rank is captured. %1$s username change detected %1$s user ID didn\'t match We read your user ID in %1$s as %2$s whereas, your user ID registered with Gamerboard for this game is %3$s. Please login with the correct game profile %1$s \nOR\nTry changing the background behind the user ID so that it is clearly visible. Not verified Verified To verify: Go to Lobby and Swipe right Unable to connect to server. Please check your internet connection.
